selectProfileInform: SELECT UserAccountID, Email, FullName, IsMale, PhoneNumber, PlaceName, ProvinceID, DistrictID, WardID, DATE_FORMAT(Birthday, '%d/%m/%Y') as Birthday, Image, DATE_FORMAT(CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as CreateDate, PersonID, PointsAverage, UserTypeID FROM useraccounts WHERE UserAccountID = ?
selectCheckInforLogin: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.Username, ua.UserTypeID, ua.FullName, ua.Image, ut.NameUserType FROM useraccounts as ua INNER JOIN usertype as ut ON ua.UserTypeID = ut.UserTypeID WHERE ua.Username = ? and ua.Password = ? LIMIT 1
insertSignUpForAllUser: INSERT INTO useraccounts ( Email , Username , Password , FullName , UserTypeID) SELECT ?, ?, ?, ?, ? WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT UserAccountID FROM useraccounts WHERE Email = ? OR Username = ?) LIMIT 1
updateProfileInform: UPDATE useraccounts SET FullName=?, IsMale=?, PhoneNumber=?, Place=?, Birthday=STR_TO_DATE(?, '%d/%m/%Y'), Image=?, PersonID=? WHERE UserAccountID = ?
